column4: Timeline: GM's ignition-switch recall crisis
column5: General Motors Co is grappling with a crisis over its decade-long failure to recall cars equipped with faulty ignition switches. The flaw could cause engines to shut off  leading to a sudden loss of power steering and power brakes  and the failure of air bags to deploy in a crash. So far  GM has attributed at least 61 crashes and 16 deaths to switch-related malfunctions.
